text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex/CodeSystem/ProvenanceAgentRoleType defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
author AuthorPerson or entity that originated the referenced resource
custodian CustodianThe entity that is accountable for maintaining a true an accurate copy of the original record
source SourceOrganization, Practitioner or Payer who was the source of the referenced resource
transmitter TransmitterProvenance Transmitter

name: ProvenanceAgentRoleType
title: Provenance Roles
description: CodeSystem for types of role relating to the creation or communication of referenced resources

concept.definition: Person or entity that originated the referenced resource
The entity that is accountable for maintaining a true an accurate copy of the original record
Organization, Practitioner or Payer who was the source of the referenced resource
